      • getPeople

        public java.util.List<PersonModel> getPeople()
        Query the Database.getPeople() to retrieve list of users
        Returns:
        List of PersonModel objects

      • addPerson

        public void addPerson​(FormEvent ev)
        Prepare data and adds a person to Database. Uses Database.addPerson(model.PersonModel) to add user
        Parameters:
        ev - object of FormEvent which contains all data needed to be passed after button "OK" clicked

      • removePerson

        public void removePerson​(int row)
        Ask Database to remove person.
        Parameters:
        row - number of row to delete (start from 0)

      • saveToFile

        public void saveToFile​(java.io.File file)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Sends choosed file to be saved to Database.saveToFile(File) function
        Parameters:
        file - File object
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if failed to write the file

      • loadFromFile

        public void loadFromFile​(java.io.File file)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Sends choosed file from wich info choul be loaded to Database.loadFromFile(File) function
        Parameters:
        file - File object
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if failed to read the file

      • configure

        public void configure​(int port,
                      java.lang.String user,
                      java.lang.String password)
               throws java.sql.SQLException
        Method configures database connection credentials
        Parameters:
        port - port
        user - user name
        password - user password
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if driver doesn't exists

        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if driver doesn't exists
